title: Calm your titties, Riot
body:
Let me just first voice my displeasure with Riot as it's taking months for them to fix the region transfer system and I can't wait to transfer from this fucking server. Never have I ever ran into a situation where it took a company fucking months to fix a technical issue.

On a more serious note, calm down with the champions guys. Please balance canc... I mean {{champion:518}}   first before you start making more champs.
